rukus.text: Aur aap inn ko nooh (alh-e-salam) ka qissa parh ker sunaiye jab kay unhon ney apni qom say farmaya kay aey meri qom! Agar tum ko mera rehna aur ehkaam-e-elahi ki naseehat kerna bhari maloom hota hai to mera to Allah hi per bharosa hai. Tum apni tadbeer maaye apney shurka kay pukhta kerlo phir tumhari tadbeer tumhari ghuttan ka baees nahi honi chahaiye. Aur phir meray sath ker guzro aur mujh ko mohlat na do
Phir bhi agar tum aeyraaz hi kiye jao to mein ney tum say koi maawza to nahi maanga mera maawza to sirf Allah hi kay zimmay hai aur mujh ko hukum kiya gaya hai kay mein musalmanon mein say rahon

So woh log inn ko jhutlatay rahey pus hum ney inn ko aur jo inn kay sath kashti mein thay unn ko nijat di aur unn ko janasheen banaya aur jinhon ney humari aayaton ko jhutlaya tha unn ko gharq ker diya. So dekhna chahaiye kaisa anjam hua unn logon ka jo daraye jaa chukay thay

Phir nooh (alh-e-salam) kay baad hum ney aur rasoolon ko unn ki qom ki taraf bheja so woh unn kay pass roshan daleelen ley ker aaye pus jiss cheez ko unhon ney awwal mein jhoota keh diya yeh na hua ka phir uss ko maan letay. Allah Taalaa issi tarah hadd say barhney walon kay dilon per band laga deta hai

Phir inn payghumbaron kay baad hum ney musa (alh-e-salam) aur haroon (alh-e-salam) ko firaon aur uss kay sardaron kay pass apni nishaniyan dey ker bheja. So unhon ney takabbur kiya aur woh log mujrim qom thay
Phir jab unn ko humaray pass say sahih daleel phonchi to woh log kehney lagay kay yaqeenan yeh sareeh jadoo hai
Musa (alh-e-salam) ney farmaya kay kiya tum iss sahih daleel ki nisbat jabkay woh tumharay pass phonchi aisi baat kehtay ho kiya yeh jadoo hai halankay jadoogar kaamyab nahi hua keray

Woh log kehney lagay kiya tum humaray pass iss liye aaye ho kay hum ko iss tareeqay say hata do jiss per hum ney apney baap dadon ko paya hai aur tum dono ko duniya mein baraee mill jaye aur hum tum dono ko kabhi na manen gay
Aur firaon ney kaha meray pass tamam maahir jadoogaron ko hazir kero
Phir jab jadoogar aaye to musa (alh-e-salam) ney unn say farmaya kay dalo jo kuch tum dalney walay ho

So jab unhon ney dala to musa (alh-e-salam) ney farmaya kay yeh jo kuch tum laye ho jadoo hai. Yaqeeni baat hai kay Allah iss ko abhi darhum barhumkiye deta hai Allah aisay dasadiyon ka kaam bannay nahi deta
Aur Allah Taalaa haq ko apney farmaan say sabit ker deta hai go mujrim kaisa hi na gawar samjhen
